attributes.action: Allow vehicles at Traffic Lights to turn Left on a red light after coming to a complete stop
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In most American states & Canada, vehicles are permitted to turn right at a Red Traffic Light after coming to a complete stop and if the way is clear.

By introducing a similar scheme to the UK whereby vehicles at a red traffic light are allowed to turn left after coming to a complete stop and only if the way is clear, will ease congestion at junctions and within the towns and cities.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
